author: Staff Reporter
text:
PCB employee

found dead

T. Ashok Kumar (38), office assistant at the office of Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board, Thoothukudi, was found dead in his house in Amman Kovil Street at Bryant Nagar here on Sunday. Sources said that he seemed to have committed suicide by hanging himself. A rope was also found in the house. He used to consume alcohol and quarrel with his wife often, they added.

Based on a complaint lodged by his wife Usha alias Pushpa Lakshmi (35), Thoothukudi South police registered a case under Section 174 of the Code of Criminal Procedure. The body was sent to Thoothukudi Government Medical College Hospital for post-mortem.
title: Office assistant found dead
